name: assignee_geolocation
description: Pull Request assignee geolocation from GitHub.

name: author_bot
description: True/False if the Pull Request author is a bot or not from SortingHat profile.

name: author_domain
description: Pull Request author domain name from SortingHat profile.

name: author_gender
description: Pull Request author gender, based on her name, from SortingHat (disabled by default).

name: author_gender_acc
description: Pull Request author gender accuracy from SortingHat (disabled by default).

name: author_id
description: Pull Request author ID from SortingHat profile.

name: author_name
description: Pull Request author name from SortingHat profile.

name: author_org_name
description: Pull Request author organization name from SortingHat profile.

name: author_user_name
description: Pull Request author username from SortingHat profile.

name: author_uuid
description: Pull Request author UUID from SortingHat profile.

name: closed_at
description: Date in which the Issue was closed.

name: code_merge_duration
description: Difference in days between creation and merging dates.

name: created_at
description: Date in which the Issue was created.

name: forks
description: Number of repository forks.

name: github_repo
description: GitHub repository name.

name: grimoire_creation_date
description: Pull Request creation date.

name: id
description: ID in GitHub.

name: id_in_repo
description: ID in the GitHub repository it was created.

name: is_github_pull_request
description: 1 indicating this is a Pull Request, used for counting in case other kind of items could be stored in the same index or alias.

name: item_type
description: Item type, in this case 'pull request'

name: labels
description: Pull Request assigned labels.

name: merge_author_domain
description: Merge author domain from GitHub.

name: merge_author_geolocation
description: Merge author geolocation from GitHub.

name: merge_author_location
description: Merge author location as string from GitHub.

name: merge_author_login
description: Merge author login from GitHub.

name: merge_author_name
description: Merge author name from GitHub.

name: merge_author_org
description: Merge author organization from GitHub.

name: merged
description: True if the Pull Request was already merged.

name: merged_at
description: Date when the Pull Request was merged.

name: merged_by_data_bot
description: True/False if the merge author is a bot or not, from SortingHat profile.

name: merged_by_data_domain
description: Merge author domain from SortingHat profile.

name: merged_by_data_gender
description: Merge author gender, based on her name, from SortingHat profile(disabled by default).

name: merged_by_data_gender_acc
description: Merge author gender accuracy from SortingHat profile(disabled by default).

name: merged_by_data_id
description: Merge author's ID from SortingHat profile.

name: merged_by_data_name
description: Merge author name from SortingHat profile.

name: merged_by_data_org_name
description: Merge author organization from SortingHat profile.

name: merged_by_data_user_name
description: Merge author username from SortingHat profile.

name: merged_by_data_uuid
description: Merge author UUID from SortingHat profile.

name: metadata__enriched_on
description: Date when the item was enriched.

name: metadata__gelk_backend_name
description: Name of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__gelk_version
description: Version of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__timestamp
description: Date when the item was stored in RAW index.

name: metadata__updated_on
description: Date when the item was updated on its original data source.

name: num_review_comments
description: Number of comments.

name: origin
description: Original URL where the repository was retrieved from.

name: project
description: Project.

name: project_1
description: Project (if more than one level is allowed in project hierarchy).

name: pull_request
description: True indicating this item is a pull request or not (to be used when the index is queried through aliases including other indexes).

name: repository
description: Repository name.

name: repository_labels
description: Custom repository labels defined by the user.

name: state
description: State of the Pull Request (GitHub has only 2 possible states: open or closed).

name: tag
description: Perceval tag.

name: time_open_days
description: Time the Pull Request is open counted in days.

name: time_to_close_days
description: Time to close a Pull Request counted in days.

name: time_to_merge_request_response
description: Time to get a response on a Pull Request in days.

name: title
description: The title of the Pull Request.

name: title_analyzed
description: Pull Request title split by terms to allow searching.

name: updated_at
description: Date when the Pull Request was last updated.

name: url
description: Full URL of the Pull Request.

name: url_id
description: Consists of the project path and the Pull Request id.

name: user_data_bot
description: True/False if the Pull Request author is a bot or not from SortingHat profile.

name: user_data_domain
description: Pull Request author domain name from SortingHat profile.

name: user_data_gender
description: Pull Request author gender, based on her name, from SortingHat (disabled by default).

name: user_data_gender_acc
description: Pull Request author gender accuracy from SortingHat (disabled by default).

name: user_data_id
description: Pull Request author ID from SortingHat profile.

name: user_data_name
description: Pull Request author name from SortingHat profile.

name: user_data_org_name
description: Pull Request author organization name from SortingHat profile.

name: user_data_user_name
description: Pull Request author username from SortingHat profile.

name: user_data_uuid
description: Pull Request author UUID from SortingHat profile.

name: user_domain
description: Pull Request author domain name from GitHub.

name: user_geolocation
description: Pull Request author geolocation from GitHub.

name: user_location
description: Pull Request author location as string from GitHub.

name: user_login
description: Pull Request author login from GitHub.

name: user_name
description: Pull Request author username from GitHub.

name: user_org
description: Pull Request author organization from GitHub.

name: uuid
description: Perceval UUID.
